verses.verse: Then the LORD <S%H3068><s%> answered <S%H6030><s%> Job <S%H347><s%> out of the whirlwind <S%H5591><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%>,
Who is this that darkeneth <S%H2821><s%> counsel <S%H6098><s%> by words <S%H4405><s%> without knowledge <S%H1847><s%>?
Gird up <S%H247><s%> now thy loins <S%H2504><s%> like a man <S%H1397><s%>; for I will demand <S%H7592><s%> of thee, and answer <S%H3045><s%> thou me.
Where <S%H375><s%> wast thou when I laid the foundations <S%H3245><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%>? declare <S%H5046><s%>, if thou hast <S%H3045><s%> understanding <S%H998><s%>.
Who hath laid <S%H7760><s%> the measures <S%H4461><s%> thereof, if thou knowest <S%H3045><s%>? or who hath stretched <S%H5186><s%> the line <S%H6957><s%> upon it?
Whereupon are the foundations <S%H134><s%> thereof fastened <S%H2883><s%>? or who laid <S%H3384><s%> the corner <S%H6438><s%> stone <S%H68><s%> thereof;
When the morning <S%H1242><s%> stars <S%H3556><s%> sang <S%H7442><s%> together <S%H3162><s%>, and all the sons <S%H1121><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> shouted <S%H7321><s%> for joy?
Or who shut up <S%H5526><s%> the sea <S%H3220><s%> with doors <S%H1817><s%>, when it brake forth <S%H1518><s%>, as if it had issued out <S%H3318><s%> of the womb <S%H7358><s%>?
When I made <S%H7760><s%> the cloud <S%H6051><s%> the garment <S%H3830><s%> thereof, and thick darkness <S%H6205><s%> a swaddlingband <S%H2854><s%> for it,
And brake up <S%H7665><s%> for it my decreed <S%H2706><s%> place, and set <S%H7760><s%> bars <S%H1280><s%> and doors <S%H1817><s%>,

And said <S%H559><s%>, Hitherto <S%H5704><s%> <S%H6311><s%> shalt thou come <S%H935><s%>, but no further <S%H3254><s%>: and here shall thy proud <S%H1347><s%> waves <S%H1530><s%> be stayed <S%H7896><s%>?
Hast thou commanded <S%H6680><s%> the morning <S%H1242><s%> since thy days <S%H3117><s%>; and caused the dayspring <S%H7837><s%> to know <S%H3045><s%> his place <S%H4725><s%>;
That it might take hold <S%H270><s%> of the ends <S%H3671><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%>, that the wicked <S%H7563><s%> might be shaken out <S%H5287><s%> of it?
It is turned <S%H2015><s%> as clay <S%H2563><s%> to the seal <S%H2368><s%>; and they stand <S%H3320><s%> as a garment <S%H3830><s%>.
And from the wicked <S%H7563><s%> their light <S%H216><s%> is withholden <S%H4513><s%>, and the high <S%H7311><s%> arm <S%H2220><s%> shall be broken <S%H7665><s%>.
Hast thou entered <S%H935><s%> into the springs <S%H5033><s%> of the sea <S%H3220><s%>? or hast thou walked <S%H1980><s%> in the search <S%H2714><s%> of the depth <S%H8415><s%>?
Have the gates <S%H8179><s%> of death <S%H4194><s%> been opened <S%H1540><s%> unto thee? or hast thou seen <S%H7200><s%> the doors <S%H8179><s%> of the shadow of death <S%H6757><s%>?
Hast thou perceived <S%H995><s%> the breadth <S%H7338><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%>? declare <S%H5046><s%> if thou knowest <S%H3045><s%> it all.
Where is the way <S%H1870><s%> where light <S%H216><s%> dwelleth <S%H7931><s%>? and as for darkness <S%H2822><s%>, where is the place <S%H4725><s%> thereof,
That thou shouldest take <S%H3947><s%> it to the bound <S%H1366><s%> thereof, and that thou shouldest know <S%H995><s%> the paths <S%H5410><s%> to the house <S%H1004><s%> thereof?
Knowest <S%H3045><s%> thou it, because thou wast then born <S%H3205><s%>? or because the number <S%H4557><s%> of thy days <S%H3117><s%> is great <S%H7227><s%>?
Hast thou entered <S%H935><s%> into the treasures <S%H214><s%> of the snow <S%H7950><s%>? or hast thou seen <S%H7200><s%> the treasures <S%H214><s%> of the hail <S%H1259><s%>,
Which I have reserved <S%H2820><s%> against the time <S%H6256><s%> of trouble <S%H6862><s%>, against the day <S%H3117><s%> of battle <S%H7128><s%> and war <S%H4421><s%>?
By what <S%H335><s%> way <S%H1870><s%> is the light <S%H216><s%> parted <S%H2505><s%>, which scattereth <S%H6327><s%> the east wind <S%H6921><s%> upon the earth <S%H776><s%>?
Who hath divided <S%H6385><s%> a watercourse <S%H8585><s%> for the overflowing of waters <S%H7858><s%>, or a way <S%H1870><s%> for the lightning <S%H2385><s%> of thunder <S%H6963><s%>;
To cause it to rain <S%H4305><s%> on the earth <S%H776><s%>, where no man <S%H376><s%> is; on the wilderness <S%H4057><s%>, wherein there is no man <S%H120><s%>;
To satisfy <S%H7646><s%> the desolate <S%H7722><s%> and waste <S%H4875><s%> ground; and to cause the bud <S%H4161><s%> of the tender herb <S%H1877><s%> to spring forth <S%H6779><s%>?
Hath <S%H3426><s%> the rain <S%H4306><s%> a father <S%H1><s%>? or who hath begotten <S%H3205><s%> the drops <S%H96><s%> of dew <S%H2919><s%>?
Out of whose womb <S%H990><s%> came <S%H3318><s%> the ice <S%H7140><s%>? and the hoary frost <S%H3713><s%> of heaven <S%H8064><s%>, who hath gendered <S%H3205><s%> it?
The waters <S%H4325><s%> are hid <S%H2244><s%> as with a stone <S%H68><s%>, and the face <S%H6440><s%> of the deep <S%H8415><s%> is frozen <S%H3920><s%>.
Canst thou bind <S%H7194><s%> the sweet influences <S%H4575><s%> of Pleiades <S%H3598><s%>, or loose <S%H6605><s%> the bands <S%H4189><s%> of Orion <S%H3685><s%>?
Canst thou bring forth <S%H3318><s%> Mazzaroth <S%H4216><s%> in his season <S%H6256><s%>? or canst thou guide <S%H5148><s%> Arcturus <S%H5906><s%> with his sons <S%H1121><s%>?
Knowest <S%H3045><s%> thou the ordinances <S%H2708><s%> of heaven <S%H8064><s%>? canst thou set <S%H7760><s%> the dominion <S%H4896><s%> thereof in the earth <S%H776><s%>?
Canst thou lift up <S%H7311><s%> thy voice <S%H6963><s%> to the clouds <S%H5645><s%>, that abundance <S%H8229><s%> of waters <S%H4325><s%> may cover <S%H3680><s%> thee?
Canst thou send <S%H7971><s%> lightnings <S%H1300><s%>, that they may go <S%H3212><s%>, and say <S%H559><s%> unto thee, Here we are?
Who hath put <S%H7896><s%> wisdom <S%H2451><s%> in the inward parts <S%H2910><s%>? or who hath given <S%H5414><s%> understanding <S%H998><s%> to the heart <S%H7907><s%>?
Who can number <S%H5608><s%> the clouds <S%H7834><s%> in wisdom <S%H2451><s%>? or who can stay <S%H7901><s%> the bottles <S%H5035><s%> of heaven <S%H8064><s%>,
When the dust <S%H6083><s%> groweth <S%H3332><s%> into hardness <S%H4165><s%>, and the clods <S%H7263><s%> cleave fast together <S%H1692><s%>?
Wilt thou hunt <S%H6679><s%> the prey <S%H2964><s%> for the lion <S%H3833><s%>? or fill <S%H4390><s%> the appetite <S%H2416><s%> of the young lions <S%H3715><s%>,
When they couch <S%H7817><s%> in their dens <S%H4585><s%>, and abide <S%H3427><s%> in the covert <S%H5521><s%> to <S%H3926><s%> lie in wait <S%H695><s%>?

Who provideth <S%H3559><s%> for the raven <S%H6158><s%> his food <S%H6718><s%>? when his young ones <S%H3206><s%> cry <S%H7768><s%> unto God <S%H410><s%>, they wander <S%H8582><s%> for lack <S%H1097><s%> of meat <S%H400><s%>.
